data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Some people prefer to have a larger group of friends, while others prefer to have a small circle of friends. What do you think are the advantages and disadvantages of each? Use examples from your personal experience or observations to support your position.
data.answer: Some people like to have more friends, while others like to have a small group of friends. My take on this issue is that I prefer to have a small group of friends. People who want to have many friends believe that making different friends makes them feel more valuable about their existence. However, I think friendship is not about how many but more about the quality of friendship. High-quality friendships bring more satisfaction and value to people. （80 words）
